description:
Japan’s post-apocalyptic wasteland replete with dust can only be saved by one thing—fungus. Bisco Akaboshi, a wanted criminal and skilled archer, searches for a legendary mushroom, known as Sabikui, said to devour any and all rust. Joining him on this epic saga to save the country is a giant crab and a young doctor. Can this unlikely trio find the fabled fungi and save the land?

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: บิสโก้ นรชนคนโคตรเห็ด

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Desert
tags.description: Prominently features a desert environment.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Environmental
tags.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

title.native: 錆喰いビスコ 第2期

node.description:
__[Website](https://aaequal.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_aaequal) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/takeshi.aaequal)__

__Takeshi Ueda__ is a Japanese bassist, vocalist, lyricist and music producer.
Tsubakiyama Hinako is a composer, arranger and lyricist.

[Website](http://junnarockyou.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/junnarockyou/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/junnarockyou/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@junna_rockyou?) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnqOw96NU-jDDcFkEXGmnTg) | [Artist Profile](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/-/Artist/A025763.html)

Junna Saka, better known as JUNNA is a Japanese pop singer managed by Cube Inc. and signed to FlyingDog.

JUNNA's hobbies include watching YouTube videos. Her favorite food is (dried foods) snacks.

JUNNA is a member of the real-life idol group, [Walküre](https://anilist.co/staff/226500/Walkre)

[Profile (VIMS)](https://www.vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=60) I [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryt_suzuki)

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Asclepius](https://anilist.co/character/189144/Asclepius) - Fate/Grand Order (video games)
- Male Aran - MapleStory
- Sugawa Ginnosuke - Hanaemu Kare to & bloom
- Trey Clover - Disney: Twisted-Wonderland

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ Karaoke, gaming
__Agency:__ Across Entertainment

[Profile](http://across-ent.com/talent/men/natsuki_hanae.html) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/hanaenatsuki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanae0626) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3C3YOGFjn7Pq3lOCeUFHfg) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/hanae0626/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanae_natsuki0626/)

Won Best Rookie at the 9th Seiyuu Awards (2015) for his role as Inaho Kaizuka in _Aldnoah.Zero_. Won Best Lead Actor at the 14th Seiyuu Awards (2020) for his role as Tanjiro Kamado in _Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba_.

He is married, is a father of twin daughters, and has a cat named [Konpei](https://anilist.co/staff/269430/Konpei).

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Protagonist - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Ling Yang - Wuthering Waves (VG)
Mixing Engineer affiliated with FUNimation Entertainment.
